title: Servando Ruiz-Gómez y González-Llanos
text: Servando Ruiz-Gómez y González-Llanos (27 February 1821 in <a href="Avil%C3%A9s">Avilés</a>, <a href="Spain">Spain</a> – 19 August 1888 in <a href="Vigo">Vigo</a>, <a href="Spain">Spain</a>) was a Spanish politician, lawyer and journalist who served as <a href="Minister%20of%20Foreign%20Affairs%20%28Spain%29">Minister of State</a> from 1883 to 1884, in a <a href="Liberal%20Party%20%28Spain%2C%201880%29">liberal</a> cabinet headed by <a href="Jos%C3%A9%20de%20Posada%20y%20Herrera">José de Posada y Herrera</a>.
